metadata.title: COFFEE MATE TURTLES Liquid Coffee Enhancer

images.alt: COFFEE MATE TURTLES Liquid Coffee Enhancer
COFFEE MATE Zero Sugar French Vanilla

text: COFFEE MATE TURTLES Liquid Coffee Enhancer

Take your coffee to the next level with the delicious and aromatic COFFEE MATE TURTLES Liquid Coffee Enhancer (828 ml). Just add a dash of the perfectly balanced taste of real cocoa, smooth caramel and pecan flavour to transform every cup of coffee into a deliciously creamy, Canadian, treat - not too heavy and not too sweet. Proudly prepared in Canada, lactose-free and cholesterol-free, simply shake the bottle before pouring and stir well to enjoy a fragrant and rich cup of coffee you can wake up to or recharge with.
COFFEE MATE TURTLES Liquid Coffee EnhancerFeatures and Benefits
COFFEE MATE TURTLES Liquid Coffee Enhancer (828 ml) elevates your coffee experience
Transforms your coffee with an exceptionally smooth and creamy taste with the delightful taste of cocoa, caramel and pecan
Only 35 calories per 1 tbsp (15 ml) serving
COFFEE MATE TURTLES Liquid Coffee EnhancerNutrition Information
COFFEE MATE TURTLES Liquid Coffee EnhancerIngredients

Sugar, water, high oleic soy oil, cocoa, modified milk ingredients, salt, dipotassium phosphate, flavour and artificial flavour, cellulose gel, datem, mono- and diglycerides, cellulose gum, carrageenan.

In 2023, we changed our Coffee Mate Liquid shrink sleeves so that the label no longer needs to be removed and discarded prior to recycling; now the entire bottle, sleeve and cap are recyclable together and can be put into the blue box
